hero.title: About Momai Brass
hero.subtitle: Engineering Precision Since 1993
hero.description: Momai Brass is a leading precision components manufacturer with three decades of expertise in producing high-quality metal parts for diverse industrial sectors. Our commitment to excellence drives our innovative manufacturing solutions and customer-centric approach.

meta.title: Momai Brass - Precision Manufacturing Excellence Since 1993
meta.description: 30 years of precision manufacturing expertise, delivering high-quality brass, steel, and aluminum components for automotive, pneumatic, and electrical industries.

items.title: Advanced CNC Machining Center
items.description: State-of-the-art CNC machining capabilities for complex precision component manufacturing
items.specifications: Multi-axis machining, high-precision tolerances, diverse material compatibility

items.content: Momai Brass is a premier precision components manufacturer with 30 years of expertise, specializing in producing high-quality metal parts for automotive, pneumatic, hydraulic, and electrical sectors. Our advanced CNC manufacturing capabilities and commitment to quality have established us as a trusted partner for industries requiring precision engineering.

items.title: Engineering Design
items.description: Comprehensive design and engineering analysis for optimal component performance

items.title: Material Selection
items.description: Precise material selection including brass, stainless steel, aluminum, and copper

items.title: Precision Machining
items.description: Advanced CNC machining with tight tolerances and complex geometries

items.title: Quality Inspection
items.description: Rigorous quality control and dimensional verification processes

items.title: Surface Treatment
items.description: Comprehensive surface finishing, including deburring and specialized treatments

items.title: Packaging & Delivery
items.description: Secure packaging and timely delivery of precision components
